Text: The Sinchon Museum of American War Atrocities (Korean: 신천박물관) is a museum dedicated to the Sinchon Massacre, a mass-murder of North Korean civilians allegedly carried out by US troops during the Korean War.

Text: Sinchon Museum of American War Atrocities:  The museum is located in Sinchon County of North Korea.
